item.title: Recommendations for books on accounting for IT professionals
item.description:
IT professionals who support Microsoft Dynamics GP users often ask me for book recommendations to learn accounting basics. During my Dynamics GP training sessions for IT professionals, I suggest these two books to help them better support and manage their Dynamics GP systems. McGraw-Hill 36 Hour Accounting Course (http://www.amazon.com/McGraw-Hill-36-Hour-Accounting-Course-Courses/dp/0071486038) This book offers a comprehensive and concise introduction to accounting. Its structure allows readers to learn at their own pace, focusing on small sections at a time...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recommendations-for-books-on-accounting-for-it-professionals/
